attributes.action: Extend the zigzag yellows school lines near a local school
attributes.background: Our.local school have a lot of cars parking on a conor right next to the school where people park dangerously causing it dangerous and hard.for kids to cross safely

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
